column4: in cooperation with the national armed forces caught hunters red handed on January 21
column6: monitor lizards with a combined weight of 17 kilograms was taken from the poachers.------The crackdown was due to illegal hunting illegal in protected areas. The  people responsible were educated about their activities and allowed to go home.------After a documented inquiry
column7: the Gendarmerie took the wild animals back into the forest. In addition
column8: the forces have also called on the people to join together to protect Cambodian wildlife.------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/286602------
